text: Childhood officially ended when the ink dried on divorce papers; reality hit like a lorry – standing solo turns you adult pretty fast!
Always hear we're 'listening gurus'. Funny thing though - catch me zoning out during long meetings like anyone else!
Schedules clash; sometimes solo dinner becomes habit not choice.
Can't escape it - catch myself unpicking people's choice of words like puzzle pieces during chats. Makes for lively banter though!

Dead right! Society has us racing against some fairy tale clock – barely makes sense if we all live different stories. Just because the calendar flips doesn't mean you've got all those 'adulthood' boxes ticked off automatically – or ever need to!
Definitely progressing; still room for improvement though!
Totally noticed a uptick in dudes joining the therapy game recently—diversity's definitely shaking things up over here too.
Gendered job prep? Schools finally taking action over rhetoric!
Sparks may ignite the flame, but it's sharing values that keeps it burning through any weather!
Evolved expectations just part of life’s growth.
Been there too - life's thrown its fair share lessons at me. True lasting bonds are part art form requiring growth together despite hiccups along the way!
